original_text: But when the Jews spake against it, I was constrained to appeal unto Caesar; not that I had ought to accuse my nation of.
korean_text: 유대인들이 반대하기로 내가 마지 못하여 가이사에게 상소함이요 내 민족을 고발하려는 것이 아니니라

sentences.original_text: But when the Jews spake against it
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 유대인들이 그것을 반대하여 말했을 때

sentences.original_text: I was constrained to appeal unto Caesar
